musicplayer_join.in_use:
I can't join mutiple voice channel on the same guild.
 There are also somebody listening to the music in the voice channel I'm currently in.

musicplayer_join.can_force_move: **Or... just (ab)use your admin permissions and move me to where you want!**
musicplayer_join.already_joined_description: Already in the voice channel you are currently connected to

musicplayer_leave.success: Successfully left the voice channel, see ya!
